alert.note: Alert for Cooper; Pettis; Saline (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 3:27PM CDT until September 23 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Pettis County in central Missouri... Southern Saline County in central Missouri... West central Cooper County in central Missouri... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 326 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sweet Springs, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marshall, Sweet Springs, Houstonia, Nelson, Blackwater and Mount Leonard. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between mile markers 64 and 88. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
